paragraphs.title: Configuration
paragraphs.text:
val NumPartitions = 32
val OptSaveMode: Option[org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode] = Some(org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode.Overwrite/*ErrorIfExists*/)
val DatasetId = 1
val StudyName = "anticipation"

val WorkDir = s"/tmp/$StudyName"
val ProcessingDir = s"$WorkDir/processing"
val DisambigDir = s"$WorkDir/disambiguation"

OptSaveMode: Option[org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode] = Some(Overwrite)
DatasetId: Int = 1
StudyName: String = anticipation
WorkDir: String = /tmp/anticipation
ProcessingDir: String = /tmp/anticipation/processing
DisambigDir: String = /tmp/anticipation/disambiguation

paragraphs.title: Definitions
paragraphs.text:
import scala.util.hashing.MurmurHash3

def hash(s: String): Long = MurmurHash3.stringHash(s).toLong

val hashUDF = sqlc.udf.register("hashUDF", (s: String) => hash(s))

result.msg:
import scala.util.hashing.MurmurHash3
hash: (s: String)Long
hashUDF: org.apache.spark.sql.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,LongType,List())

paragraphs.text:
publications.select('title).distinct.selectExpr("lower(title) as lc_title").groupBy('lc_title).count().filter('count > 1).count()
// Publication titles are case sensitive

result.msg:
lc_title	title_set	s
taking european knowledge society seriously	WrappedArray(Taking European Knowledge Society seriously, Taking European knowledge society seriously, Taking European Knowledge Society Seriously)	3
left to their own devices: breakdowns in united states medical device premarket review	WrappedArray(Left to their own devices: breakdowns in United States Medical Device premarket review, Left to their own devices: breakdowns in United States medical device premarket review)	2

the salience of small: nanotechnology coverage in the american press, 1986-2004	WrappedArray(The salience of small: nanotechnology coverage in the American Press, 1986-2004, The Salience of Small: Nanotechnology Coverage in the American Press, 1986-2004)	2
outlining ethical issues in nanotechnologies	WrappedArray(OUTLINING ETHICAL ISSUES IN NANOTECHNOLOGIES, Outlining ethical issues in nanotechnologies)	2
converging technologies-shaping the future of european societies	WrappedArray(Converging technologies-shaping the future of European Societies, Converging Technologies-Shaping the Future of European Societies)	2
great uncertainty about small things	WrappedArray(GREAT UNCERTAINTY ABOUT SMALL THINGS, Great uncertainty about small things)	2
knocking out pain in livestock: can technology succeed where morality has stalled?	WrappedArray(Knocking Out Pain in Livestock: Can Technology Succeed Where Morality has Stalled?, Knocking out pain in livestock: can technology succeed where morality has stalled?)	2

import scala.util.hashing.MurmurHash3
hash: (s: String)Long
hashUDF: org.apache.spark.sql.UserDefinedFunction = UserDefinedFunction(<function1>,LongType,List(StringType))

paragraphs.title: publications4

result.msg: publications4: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [pub_id: bigint, is_main: boolean, is_backward: boolean, is_forward: boolean, title: string, year: smallint, times_cited: int, document_types: array<string>, abstract: string, is_conference: boolean, author_keywords: array<string>, keywords_plus: array<string>, research_areas: array<string>, wos_categories: array<string>, scielo_categories: array<string>, scielo_collections: array<string>, dis_id: bigint, dis_title: string]

paragraphs.title: Sanity Checks
paragraphs.text:
/*
- rid are indeed unique for a given did
- no hash collisions
*/

assert(publications4.count() == publications4.select('pub_id).distinct.count())
assert(publications4.select('pub_id, 'dis_id).distinct.groupBy('dis_id).count().filter('count > 1).count() == 0)

result.msg: c	lc_abstract_hash	dis_id	pub_id	dis_title	year	times_cited	document_types

paragraphs.title: Sanity checks
paragraphs.text:
/*
- document types are not case sensitive
*/

assert(publications4.explode("document_types", "document_type")((a: Seq[String]) => Option(a).getOrElse(Seq.empty[String])).select('document_type).distinct.selectExpr("lower(document_type) as lc_document_type").groupBy('lc_document_type).count().filter('count > 1).count() == 0)
